name: funnySlot-html5 source code
description:
Funny slot was written using my own framework visual js in the canvas 2D technology.
Support :
-configure on the server-side (node.js) {setup array for reels}
-Animations in backgroundFor better performance for older devices remove objects with particles.
Easy to edit
Video tutorial :
How to start game

How to change images and slot configin res/ folder put folder with image or images ,
start run_res.bat or node res.js Check in Browser console object RESOURCE.NEW_RES_NAME

Optimized for desktops android and ios .
Try demo on https://maximumroulette.com/framework/
With download you accept conditionally : maximumroulette.com/MaximumrouletteLicence.txt

more information about visual-js

https://bitbucket.org/nikola_l/visual-js
